name: Codeclouds Technologies
overview:
Codeclouds Technologies is globally recognized top web designing company, located in Kolkata. The company inspires to create & deliver the best quality projects for its clients. Established in 2003, Codeclouds has encountered a high growth. The reason for its success is delivering quality projects to all its clients on a global perspective.

The team at Codeclouds Technologies also delivers custom web applications. The versatility in designing projects makes the company special than other competitors.

The expertise & experience in project management of the developers add to the value of the company.

Services Provided:-

â€“ Website Design â€“ Web Application â€“ ecommerce website design â€“ CRM â€“ Continuity Programs

Website Design:- The most important part of web designing is the combination of technology along with the style of creative design. That is what Codeclouds provides to its clients in very low price.

Some main attributes of Codeclouds Technologies are:-

â€“ Highly qualified experienced & creative Web designers. â€“ Always keeping up with the relevant changes in the web design industry. â€“ Fulfilling the needs of the customer & making them happy. â€“ Satisfying customers for 6 years with great projects.

Web Application:- Codeclouds Technologies not only provides quality web sites but also delivers user friendly web applications. Keeping in mind the necessity of the client, the company develops the Software in such a way that it supports the complete software development life cycle & is compatible for any kind of technical platform.

iPhone:- Codeclouds Technologies also has vast experience in developing iphone applications. The following applications falls under its focus area:-

â€“ Office/Business application â€“ Multimedia Application â€“ Internet Application â€“ Fun Application â€“ Games â€“ Utility application â€“ Advertising agencies â€“ Media firms â€“ Real estate companies â€“ Film industry â€“ Travel agencies â€“ Finance and insurance â€“ Retail and wholesale

The team of dedicated software developers along with experience provides the extra edge to the software developed.

Google Android:- Mobile applications for the android platform are also developed by Codeclouds Technologies. This helps to support third party mobile applications to execute in Android platform. The company also provides support for Wi-Fi, GPS application for Android platform. Their highly talented developers make much easy to use applications for the platform. Categories of Android applications are:-

â€¢ Communication application â€¢ Office/Business application â€¢ Multimedia Application â€¢ Travel Application â€¢ Internet Application â€¢ Utility application â€¢ Security applications â€¢ Location-Based Tools Applications â€¢ Barcode Scanners Applications â€¢ Travel Guides Applications â€¢ Games Application

Final Conclusion:- Being one of the best companies in their field, Codeclouds Technologies is still looking to grow as a complete website development company. The company has every kind of resource to provide the best quality deliverable output. The experience of employees & their application of knowledge in the web development is one of the big advantages that Codeclouds Technologies can boost off over its competitors.
